titles.title: You Are A New Creation, A Royal Priesthood

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You are a new creation, a royal priesthood.
A holy nation, a peculiar people. A chosen generation.
More than a conqueror.
Separated unto the Master, a habitation unto the Lord.
Chorus:
O Blessed habitation, a holy habitation;
In Him alone must we dwell, and live,
And move, and have our being.
Eternal habitation, perfect habitation,
We choose to live separated unto Him.
